person.persName: Patrick Henry Clay Bruce (Lewis County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Lewis County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Malinda Crawford Bruce in Lewis County, Kentucky, on November 7, 1839. Father of Morgan L. Bruce, Martha A. Bruce, Thomas H. Bruce, John Bruce, Alexander Bruce, Laura Bruce, and Isabella Bruce. Farmer in Lewis County in 1850. Employed Richard Anderson in Lewis County in 1850. Postmaster at Rock Creek from January 22, 1857 to June 29, 1859. Farmer in Lewis County in 1860.
